complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the AI-Powered Form Builder Implementation into 6 subtasks covering component library creation, voice-to-text integration, validation logic, form flow design, progressive disclosure implementation, and accessibility compliance.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple technical components including React development, API integration for speech recognition, complex form logic, and accessibility requirements. The mobile-first approach and customization needs add additional complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Itinerary Generation Engine Development into 7 subtasks covering preference matching algorithms, day-by-day structure creation, geographical sequencing logic, modular component system, media integration, pricing calculation engine, and performance optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is one of the most complex tasks as it involves sophisticated AI algorithms, complex data processing, geographical optimization, and strict performance requirements. The core functionality of the application depends on this component.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Interactive Trip Customization Interface into 6 subtasks covering UI component development, accommodation selection interface, activity management functionality, real-time pricing updates, drag-and-drop implementation, and state management system.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires complex UI interactions including drag-and-drop functionality, real-time updates, and state management across multiple components. The mobile optimization adds another layer of complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Visual Itinerary Display Implementation into 5 subtasks covering responsive layout design, image gallery implementation, swipeable navigation interface, component development for hotels and flights, and progressive loading optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While challenging, this task is more straightforward than some others. It focuses on UI implementation with performance considerations. The complexity comes from optimizing for mobile and handling various network conditions.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the CRM Integration Development into 6 subtasks covering API integration for multiple CRM platforms, webhook system development, email template generation, lead quality scoring implementation, data formatting adapters, and security/monitoring setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Integrating with multiple third-party CRM systems is inherently complex. Each platform has its own API requirements, authentication methods, and data formats. The real-time data transfer and security requirements add significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Mobile Optimization and Responsive Design task into 5 subtasks covering UI component auditing and optimization, touch interaction improvements, responsive layout implementation, performance optimization for mobile networks, and offline capability development.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires comprehensive review and optimization of the entire application for mobile use. The performance optimization for various network conditions and offline capabilities add significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the White-Label Customization System into 5 subtasks covering theming system development, configuration interface creation, client-specific content management, template system implementation, and role-based access control setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a flexible white-label system requires careful architecture to ensure customizations don't interfere with core functionality. The role-based access control and preview functionality add complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Testing, Documentation, and Deployment task into 7 subtasks covering test suite development, user and technical documentation creation, analytics implementation, deployment automation, monitoring setup, security auditing, and training material development.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task encompasses multiple critical areas including comprehensive testing, documentation for different audiences, security auditing, and deployment preparation. The dependencies on all other tasks make this particularly complex to coordinate.
